bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXI (Nos 4093-4300) with contributions by C.F.L. Austin, R.L. Fowler, E.W. Handley, P.J. Parsons, P. Schubert, A. Swiderek

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXI, 4093-4300. - I. Comedy (4093-4095). - II. Mythographic Texts (4096-4099). - III. Thucydides (4100-4112). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4113-4132). - V. Astronomical Texts (4133-4300: Descriptive List).
bibl.seg: GAGOS T., M.W. HASLAM and N. LEWIS, with contributions by C.F.L. AUSTIN, R.L. FOWLER, E.W. HANDLEY, P.J. PARSONS, P. SCHUBERT, A. SWIDEREK, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXI (Nos 4093-4300). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 81.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1995, 8°, xii-163 pp. et XII pll. ISBN 0-85698-126-5. £55.

P. Oxy. LXI, 4093-4300. - I. Comedy (4093-4095). - II. Mythographic Texts (4096-4099). - III. Thucydides (4100-4112). - IV. Documents of the Roman and Byzantine Periods (4113-4132). - V. Astronomical Texts (4133-4300: Descriptive List).

C.R. par Bernhard Palme, Tyche 13 (1998) pp. 301-302. - Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 73 (1998) No. 145, pp. 168-172. - Wolfgang Luppe, Gnomon 70 (1998) pp. 580-585. - Jane Rowlandson, CR N.S., 48 (1998) p. 558. - G.M. Parássoglou, Hellenika 46 (1996) pp. 175-178 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LX]. - Hans-Albert Ruprecht, ZSav 116 (1999) pp. 600-603 [concerne aussi: P. Oxy. LXII].
Gagos Haslam Lewis Austin Fowler Handley Parsons Schubert Swiderek
